content: color palette socks are a wonderful and easy way to use your minis or scrap yarn to create beautiful colorways size the pattern features one size - approx 38-39 eu circumference 20cm length adjustable yarn you ll need approx 250-280 meters of light fingering weight sock yarn the sample is knit in arwetta classic by filcolana colorways 101 977 971 334 354 973 needles 2 5 mm/us 1 5 dpns this pattern has not been tech edited feel free to contact me if you have any problems or questions about the pattern
